Title: Relates to the filling of borrow pits in Jamaica Bay
Summary: Relates to the filling of borrow pits in Jamaica Bay; prohibits the filling in of borrow pits with sediment or fill materials.
LawCode: Amd ยง15-0505, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to prohibiting the filling of borrow pits in Jamaica Bay
